steps.title: Listing your personality type on Tinder provides insight into who you are.
steps.content: Listing your personality type on Tinder provides insight into who you are. Your Tinder bio is probably full of information about you, from what kind of relationship you’re looking for to what your interests and hobbies are. Adding your personality type is another way to tell potential matches what you’re like. The Myers-Briggs Type Indicator (MBTI) uses Carl Jung’s psychological theory to sort people into 16 personality types, based on 4 categories: [1] X Research source Extraversion (E) or Introversion (I) , determined by where you focus your attention: on the outer world or your inner world Intuition (N) or Sensing (S) , based on how you take in information: using your physical senses or your instincts and impressions Thinking (T) or Feeling (F) , determined by the way you make decisions: solely using logic or by weighing how it will affect the people involved Judging (J) or Perceiving (P) , based on how you deal with the world around you: if you prefer routines and structure or are more flexible and spontaneous

steps.title: ISTJ: The Logistician
steps.content: ISTJ: The Logistician An ISTJ personality is detail-oriented, organized, and serious. [2] X Trustworthy Source Simply Psychology Popular site for evidence-based psychology information Go to source They’re often described as detached, analytical, reserved, and traditional. In a relationship, an ISTJ tends to be loyal and committed. [3] X Research source Usually, an ISTJ is pretty particular about who they’d date and will make rules about who they'll swipe right on, so you must have checked most of their boxes if you matched on Tinder . If you land a date with an ISTJ, make sure to show up on time. If you send a last-minute text to reschedule or rush in 20 minutes late looking a mess, they won't be impressed. Best Matches: ESTJ, ISFJ, ESFJ [4] X Research source

steps.title: ISFJ: The Defender
steps.content: ISFJ: The Defender A person with an ISFJ personality has a strong sense of obligation, duty, and responsibility. [5] X Trustworthy Source Simply Psychology Popular site for evidence-based psychology information Go to source They’re understanding, patient, loyal, and helpful to others. As a partner, an ISFJ will be committed and a good caretaker. [6] X Research source An ISFJ is usually interested in long-term relationships but may be too shy to send the first message. If you match on Tinder and hit things off, an ISFJ will become smitten pretty quickly. Don't be afraid to send the first message to an ISFJ who catches your eye. Give them a compliment and ask about their career or passion to start a conversation . Best Matches: ISTJ, ESTJ, ESFJ [7] X Research source

steps.title: INFJ: The Advocate
steps.content: INFJ: The Advocate An INFJ personality tends to be compassionate, hardworking, and conscientious. [8] X Trustworthy Source Simply Psychology Popular site for evidence-based psychology information Go to source They’re idealistic, imaginative, sensitive, and empathetic. An INFJ is good at understanding human relationships and how their partner feels. [9] X Research source An INFJ is an equal-opportunity swiper on Tinder and wants to know everything about everyone they match with. Play a game of Would You Rather? to get to know an INFJ and see if you're compatible. Best Matches: INFP, ENFP, ENFJ [10] X Research source

steps.title: INTJ: The Architect
steps.content: INTJ: The Architect Those with an INTJ personality are analytical, independent, driven, and logical. [11] X Trustworthy Source Simply Psychology Popular site for evidence-based psychology information Go to source They enjoy an intellectual challenge and are achievement-oriented. An INTJ is reserved and private, and may have trouble engaging in social conversations, even on a dating app like Tinder. They’re also not one to praise their partner. [12] X Research source To catch the attention of an INTJ on Tinder, spark an intellectual conversation. Ask about their thoughts on foreign policy or climate change, for instance. Best Matches: ENFP, ENTP [13] X Research source

steps.title: ISTP: The Crafter
steps.content: ISTP: The Crafter Someone with an ISTP personality tends to be independent, adventure-seeking, and fearless. [14] X Trustworthy Source Simply Psychology Popular site for evidence-based psychology information Go to source They’re practical and also adaptable. An ISTP is usually reserved and quiet, so their relationship partners may find them hard to read—especially on a dating app like Tinder. [15] X Research source If you match with an ISTP and are into them, suggest a spontaneous date so you can meet in person. Best Matches: ESTJ, ESFJ [16] X Research source

steps.title: ISFP: The Artist
steps.content: ISFP: The Artist An ISFP personality is usually friendly, sensitive, and quiet. [17] X Trustworthy Source Simply Psychology Popular site for evidence-based psychology information Go to source They cooperate well with other people and are caring. In a relationship, an ISFP will value their independence and space to do their own thing. [18] X Research source It might take an ISFP some time to open up as they tend to be shy, so don’t be afraid to take to lead if you match with one on Tinder. Best Matches: ENFJ, ESTJ, ESFJ [19] X Research source

steps.title: INFP: The Mediator
steps.content: INFP: The Mediator Someone with an INFP personality type is loyal and idealistic, with strong morals and values. [20] X Trustworthy Source Simply Psychology Popular site for evidence-based psychology information Go to source An INFP is imaginative, insightful, and caring. As a partner, they may not share their feelings and values, which can make them hard to understand. [21] X Research source They’re likely to be looking for love on Tinder but might be too timid to reach out to you, first. Send a thoughtful message that mentions something in an INFP's bio to show them that you're interested in them, specifically. Best Matches: ENFJ, ENTJ [22] X Research source

steps.title: INTP: The Thinker
steps.content: INTP: The Thinker An INTP is typically an analytical person who's a great problem-solver. [23] X Trustworthy Source Simply Psychology Popular site for evidence-based psychology information Go to source They’re independent, logical, and value their autonomy, even in a relationship. [24] X Research source An INTP probably won’t put a ton of effort into finding love on Tinder, but may open the app and swipe when they’re bored. If you’re intrigued by an INTP, strike up a convo. Break the ice by asking for their opinion or advice. Best Matches: ENTJ [25] X Research source

steps.title: ESTP: The Persuader
steps.content: ESTP: The Persuader Someone categorized as an ESTP tends to be sophisticated, pragmatic, and action-oriented. [26] X Trustworthy Source Simply Psychology Popular site for evidence-based psychology information Go to source They’re also outgoing and enthusiastic. They can be a bit impatient in relationships and like to take risks. [27] X Research source An ESTP might be looking for a fling rather than a serious relationship on Tinder. Suggest a spontaneous meet-up rather than planning a traditional date to woo an ESTP. Best Matches: ISTP, ESTP, ESTJ, ENTP [28] X Research source

steps.title: ESFP: The Entertainer
steps.content: ESFP: The Entertainer One with an ESFP personality is friendly, impulsive, and outgoing. [29] X Trustworthy Source Simply Psychology Popular site for evidence-based psychology information Go to source They’re cooperative and tolerant. An ESFP makes a supportive partner who enjoys companionship. [30] X Research source They’re always up for meeting new people on Tinder, and are just as likely to make friends as they are to find a date. Take an ESFP to a social event, like a gallery opening, where they can chat with other people and let their personality shine. Best Matches: ISTJ, ISFJ [31] X Research source

steps.title: ENFP: The Champion
steps.content: ENFP: The Champion An ENFP is likely to be enthusiastic, supportive, and energetic. [32] X Trustworthy Source Simply Psychology Popular site for evidence-based psychology information Go to source They’re friendly and outgoing. In a relationship, their partner may find them to be perceptive and also someone who feels a wide range of intense emotions. [33] X Research source An ENFP likes chatting and is just as likely to make friends on Tinder as a romantic connection. To escape the friend zone , let an ENFP know right away that you're interested in them romantically and try a date that's sweet and intimate, like a picnic under the stars. Best Matches: INFJ, INTJ [34] X Research source

steps.title: ENTP: The Debater
steps.content: ENTP: The Debater A person with an ENTP personality tends to be outspoken, lively, innovative, and full of ideas. [35] X Trustworthy Source Simply Psychology Popular site for evidence-based psychology information Go to source They’re also enthusiastic and imaginative. As a romantic partner, they tend to be independent and appreciate intellectual debates. [36] X Research source An ENTP will be honest about what they’re looking for on Tinder and what their opinions are. To catch the attention of an ENTP, send them a question posing a philosophical question, like "Is time travel ethical?" Best Matches: INFJ, INTJ [37] X Research source

steps.title: ESTJ: The Director
steps.content: ESTJ: The Director Someone with an ESTJ personality type is usually organized, practical, assertive, and responsible. [38] X Trustworthy Source Simply Psychology Popular site for evidence-based psychology information Go to source They’re competent, efficient, and decisive. An ESTJ makes a dependable partner who will take a relationship seriously. [39] X Research source If they like your Tinder bio, they won’t hesitate to reach out. If your first chat goes well, they’ll likely want to set up a date. If you're comfortable with it, let the ESTJ take the lead when planning dates or trips so they can showcase their decision-making and organizational skills. Best Matches: ISFP, ISTP [40] X Research source

steps.title: ESFJ: The Caregiver
steps.content: ESFJ: The Caregiver An ESFJ personality type is caring, helpful, and full of warmth. [41] X Trustworthy Source Simply Psychology Popular site for evidence-based psychology information Go to source They’re also outgoing, organized, and loyal. An ESFJ will be an empathetic partner who is attuned to the emotions of those around them. [42] X Research source If you have mutual friends on Tinder, they’re more likely to reach out to you. An ESFJ is a fan of group hangouts, so don’t hesitate to suggest hitting up a house party or another social activity as a way to get to know each other. Best Matches: ISFP, ISTP [43] X Research source

steps.title: ENFJ: The Protagonist
steps.content: ENFJ: The Protagonist As an ENFJ , they tend to be aware of other people’s emotions and are friendly and loyal. [44] X Trustworthy Source Simply Psychology Popular site for evidence-based psychology information Go to source They’re also enthusiastic and supportive. In a relationship, an ENFJ will support their partner and their emotional needs. [45] X Research source If you match with an ENFJ on Tinder, be prepared for them to ask a lot of personal questions—and even give you some advice. Catch the attention of an ENFJ by opening up about your life and feelings. Don't worry—they'll be empathetic! Best Matches: INFP, ISFP [46] X Research source

steps.title: ENTJ: The Commander
steps.content: ENTJ: The Commander A person with an ENTJ personality is a planner who appreciates structure and likes to be in charge. [47] X Trustworthy Source Simply Psychology Popular site for evidence-based psychology information Go to source They’re confident and direct. In a romantic relationship, they’ll be fair and decisive, and they enjoy stimulating conversations. [48] X Research source On Tinder, an ENTJ is probably looking for a long-term relationship. They’ll be direct and ask out someone they’re interested in. Strike up a convo with an ENTJ by asking a thought-provoking question such as, "What does it mean to be successful?" Best Matches: INFP, INTP [49] X Research source

steps.title: Select your personality type from the options in the profile section.
steps.content: Select your personality type from the options in the profile section. Open your Tinder app and select “Edit Profile.” Scroll to the “Basic” section and select “Personality Type.” Then, choose your Myers-Briggs personality type from the options listed and click “Done” to save your changes. That’s all there is to it!
